name: Canadian Solar Inc.
description: Canadian Solar Inc. is one of the world's largest and most innovative solar companies, dedicated to providing high-quality solar products and solutions. Founded in 2001 by Dr. Shawn Qu, Canadian Solar has established itself as a leader in the renewable energy sector, with a mission to create a sustainable future through solar energy. The company operates in multiple segments, including the manufacturing of solar photovoltaic (PV) modules, development of solar power projects, and providing energy storage solutions. With a strong global presence, Canadian Solar has shipped over 52 GW of solar modules to customers in more than 150 countries. Its product offerings include a wide range of solar panels, inverters, and energy storage systems, designed to meet the diverse needs of residential, commercial, and utility-scale applications. Canadian Solar is also actively involved in solar power project development, with a significant portfolio of projects in operation and under development around the globe. The company is committed to research and development, continually innovating to improve the efficiency and performance of its solar technologies. As the world shifts towards renewable energy, Canadian Solar aims to lead the charge, providing clean and sustainable energy solutions to help combat climate change.

seo.meta_title: Canadian Solar Inc. | Leading Solar Energy Solutions Provider
seo.meta_description: Explore Canadian Solar Inc., a global leader in solar energy solutions. Discover their innovative solar products and commitment to sustainability.

faq.question: What does Canadian Solar do?
faq.answer: Canadian Solar manufactures solar PV modules and provides solar energy solutions, including project development and energy storage.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Canadian Solar?
faq.answer: Dr. Shawn Qu is the CEO of Canadian Solar Inc.

faq.question: Where is Canadian Solar headquartered?
faq.answer: Canadian Solar is headquartered in Guelph, Ontario, Canada.

faq.question: What are Canadian Solar's main products?
faq.answer: Canadian Solar's main products include solar modules, inverters, and energy storage systems.
